definition: to exert all one's force/all-out effort/CL:股[gu3]
ruthless/fierce/ferocious/determined/to harden (one's heart)/old variant of 很[hen3]

sentences.english: I ran up and threw my arms around him.
sentences.chinese: 我跑了上去，狠勁用胳膊攬住他。

sentences.english: This is the kind of fortitude we must have.
